com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.report

Interface Report

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FlagExtractionReport, ReportProxy

    public interface Report
    The IReport parses the XML checking report provided by the Acrolinx Server and converts the content into a list of flags. You can call getFlags() to get the collection of flags. Report.toString() returns a textual representation of the checking result which can be used for debugging and logging purposes.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Report NULL
      The NULL object for a report.

    • Field Detail

      • NULL

        static final Report NULL
        The NULL object for a report.

    • Method Detail

      • getFlags

        List<Flag> getFlags()
        Returns:
        the flags, i.e. all issues in the checked document

      • getCheckingScope

        CheckingScope getCheckingScope()
        Returns:
        the checking scope. See CheckingScope.

      • getCheckingScore

        int getCheckingScore()
        Returns:
        the checking score, which indicates the ratio between errors and checked words. Higher values indicate a poorer quality of the document. This is a legacy method and the quality score for the new Scorecard, which is available from server v4.0 onwards, can be retrieved using getQualityScore().

      • getDocumentStatus

        DocumentStatus getDocumentStatus()
        Returns:
        the document status. The thresholds for the different states are configured server-side. This is a legacy method and the document status for the new Scorecard, which is available from server v4.0 onwards, can be retrieved using getQualityStatus().

      • getMetaInformation

        Map<String,String> getMetaInformation()
        Returns:
        meta information for the checked document as key-value-map. Content of the map differs depending on the client that started the check.

      • getCheckingInformation

        CheckingInformation getCheckingInformation()
        Returns:
        the checking information providing information like check start and check end

      • getSummary

        ReportSummary getSummary()
        Returns:
        the summary of flags in the report. Including the information which type of flags were checked. You can use the ReportSummary e.g. if you want to display a check result dialog.

      • isAdmittedTermNameCustomized

        boolean isAdmittedTermNameCustomized()
        Returns:
        true, if a customized name for admitted terms is used for checking

      • getCustomizedAdmittedTermName

        String getCustomizedAdmittedTermName()
        Returns:
        the customized admitted term name on the Acrolinx Server used for checking. Use this value only if isAdmittedTermNameCustomized() is true.

      • getQualityStatus

        String getQualityStatus()
        Returns:
        fetches the project quality status for the new Scorecard.

      • getQualityScore

        int getQualityScore()
        Returns:
        fetches the project quality score for the new Scorecard.
